long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This ChatGPT prompting tool allows you to create a set of prompts that are always available as you chat. While most prompting tools only allow you to start a chat with your custom prompt, this tool is always ready, unobtrusively located in the lower right corner. Quickly add to your chat with the phrases you use most such as "Please continue from exactly where you left off" or "Output your response in markdown formatting"
